  • Method Details

    • init

      void init()
      Initializes the storage file service.

    • storeFile

      boolean storeFile(Long userId, String bucketName, String directoryPath, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Stores a given file in the storage under a given bucket and directory.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      bucketName - The name of the bucket the file should be stored in.
      directoryPath - The path to store the file in.
      file - the file to store
      Returns:
      true if the file was stored successfully, false otherwise

    • deleteFile

      boolean deleteFile(Long userId, String bucketName, String filePath)
      Deletes a file from a user bucket
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      bucketName - The name of the bucket.
      filePath - The path of the file.
      Returns:
      true if the bucket was deleted successfully, false otherwise.

    • loadAll

      Stream<Path> loadAll(Long userId)
      Loads all files from a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      Returns:
      Stream of paths to the files

    • loadAllByPath

      Stream<Path> loadAllByPath(Long userId, String searchPath)
      Loads all files from a user under a given path.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      searchPath - The path to search for.
      Returns:
      Stream of paths to the files

    • loadbyPath

      Path loadbyPath(Long userId, String bucket, Path filePath)
      Loads a file from a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      filePath - The Path of the file to load
      Returns:
      the path to the file

    • loadAsResourcebyPath

      org.springframework.core.io.ByteArrayResource loadAsResourcebyPath(Long userId, String bucket, Path filePath)
      Loads a file from a user as a resource.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      filePath - The Path of the file to load
      Returns:
      the resource
